Battery.description: The `Battery` schema describes a battery unit, such as those used to provide systems with power during a power-loss event.  It also describes the location, such as a slot, socket, or bay, where a unit can be installed by populating a resource instance with an absent state if a unit is not present.
Battery.longDescription: This resource shall represent a battery for a Redfish implementation.  It may also represent a location, such as a slot, socket, or bay, where a unit may be installed if the `State` property within the `Status` property contains `Absent`.

title: #Battery.Battery
